title: [Bug]: Account information / status switcher is not shown
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

My profile picture is not shown on the top right of the application. Also when I click on it, it just shows an skeletton placeholder instead of my accoutn information and the possibility to change the status/login to another account is not shown. 

### What package are you using?

flatpak

### Version

1.12.5

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Log in to MS Teams
2. After the log in no profile picture is shown and when you click on it, no account information is shown
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1. Log in to MS Teams
2. Your profile picture is there
3. When you click on it, you can change the status, switch organisation, ...
...
```

### Debug

### Additional context

Teams in Web:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1d81de4e-4e2e-4773-9946-515ac25443d3)

Teams-for-linux:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/feeb95e3-8845-4e81-a7e1-13fa23ade1dd)

It just stays like that. 
I also have the feeling that the start of the application/log in  takes a long time.
It worked bevore and suddenly stopped working.  

I already tried to reinstall the flatpak app but this did not help.
